name: Get Lost (Swynfel, ro_obot, Closch)
description:
All the cool kids of the playground got lost in the supermarket.

Try to escape your mum and get lost as well to join the gang.

Use the arrow keys to move and press space to interact with objects.

Game made for the Global Game Jam 2021

https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/get-lost-5

Music credits:

Amazing Plan by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3358-amazing-plan
License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
